revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Synology |model=RackStation |revision=RS812 |asin=B0061JPX7Y |newegg=N82E16822108093 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=11/2011 |pcb_id=08-04ARM4214 |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=ST25P32V6P |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ1G83DFR-H9C |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (Type A), SATA II, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=5 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1 |serial=yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, RS-232 Transciever;Sipex;SP3232EC;;1;,,, 4-port SATA II Controller;Marvell;88SX7042;;1;,,, 8-Bit Flash Microcontroller;Microchip;PIC16F627A;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 28V 2A Step-Down Switching Regulator;Semtech;SC4524C;;6;,,, Dual-Channel Power Distribution Switch;Micrel;MIC2026-2YM;;1;,,, Programmable High Density PLD;Lattice Semiconductor;LC4032V;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, eSATA, Link Aggregation, SNMP, buzzer, fan, heatsink, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.9; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.12; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=blank |oui_eth=00:11:32 }} {{TagLine|4-Bay 1U Rackmount Network Attached Storage (RS812)}} :[https://www.synology.com/en-global/support/download/RS812 Support page]
"P/N:08-04ARM4214", "Model:ARM42L2" and "Ver:V1.4" are silkscreened on the board.
It's a 4-bay 1U Rackmount NAS. This device has 2x USB 2.0 and 1x eSATA ports. {{See also|Synology RackStation RS816|List of NAS Devices}}
===Reviews=== *[https://www.alphr.com/synology/synology-rackstation-rs812/31670/synology-rackstation-rs812-review/ ''Synology RackStation RS812 review'' on '''Alphr'''] (Jan. 2012)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 @1.6GHz (''Armada 300'' ARM v5) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 4MB SPI NOR Flash, 4x SATA II, 1x eSATA *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: ~100-240V, 5A via C13
==Images== <gallery> File:Synology RS812 Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:Synology RS812 Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:Synology RS812 LED.jpeg|LED Board Top File:Synology RS812 Internal.jpeg|Internal view </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
